description:
Sato may have been caught off guard, but he has one final trick up his sleeve. He begins picking off the team one by one -- and only Kei can stop him.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: Boku mo Yakusoku Shimasu yo, Satou-san
I`ll Make You a Promise Too, Mr. Sato
Moi aussi, je vais vous faire une promesse, M. Sato
僕も約束しますよ, 佐藤さん
